attributes.action: Stop the government banning XL bullies.
attributes.additional_details: Don’t ban the breed ban bad owners
attributes.background: Stop underage gang members drug dealers breeding this beautiful breed have regulations in place that responsible people who can control these beautiful dogs. Government to do more research. Bring in legislation that allows responsible ownership of this breed.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for the same action:

Bad owners are to blame not the breed - don't ban the XL bully:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/643611
